sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Button, Form, Icon, Message, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import Link from 'next/Link'; const INITIAL_USER = { name: "", email: "", password: "" }; function Signup() { const [user, setUser] = React.useState(INITIAL_USER) function handleChange(event) { const { name, value } = event.target setUser(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })) }; return <>
